Package model

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
model.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
This class is in charge of controlling the functions of each class called from the administration class

    • searchProjectSQA

      public boolean searchProjectSQA(String name)
      This method is in charge of searching for a project with the entered name, if it finds it, it will store it in the currentProject object, this has the objective of making two objects with mutual modification from one
      Parameters:
      name - name of the project to search for
      Returns:
      true: found, false: not found

    • approbationStage

      public String approbationStage(Calendar realEnd)
      Approves a project stage by calling a method of the Project class to approve a stage and saves the real end date of that stage.
      Parameters:
      realEnd - The final date on which the stage was completed.
      Returns:
      Whether the stage was approved or if no more stages can be approved.

      Returns:

    • amountType

      public String amountType(int option)
      This view method returns the number of capsules according to their type, there are two cases divided into two options using conditionals. Either for all the projects (1) that uses a reference object for each of the objects or for a current project that the user is in (2), which does not go through the project cycle, only the stages
      Parameters:
      option - the option 1 or 2.It's already burned in the Administration system
      Returns:
      Message showing the amount for each type of capsule

    • lessonStage

      public String lessonStage(int stage, int execution)
      This control method is in charge of searching all the registered lessons of a project according to the selected stage, it will also have 2 "execution" conditionals. The first(1) is in charge of using a reference project object to go through the arrangement of each one of the projects with a cycle, with the objective of returning the lessons of each project according to the stage chosen by the user. And the second (2), only returns the lessons of the project that the user is located, breaks the fix cycle with a boolean. Â¡The options are burned in the system!
      Parameters:
      stage - Position of the stage selected.
      execution - Option 1 or 2
      Returns:
      lesson of the stage selected
